product.description: Linkrunner is an AI-driven Mobile Measurement Partner (MMP) designed to help businesses track their top-performing distribution channels with granular detail, from every click to download and onboarding.

features.name: AI-driven tracking
features.description: Utilizes artificial intelligence to provide insights into distribution channel performance.

features.name: Granular channel performance tracking
features.description: Monitors key metrics such as clicks, downloads, and onboarding for distribution channels.

product.targeted_market: Businesses that rely on multiple distribution channels to acquire users for their mobile applications and need to understand the effectiveness of each channel.
product.problem_product_is_solving: Lack of clear visibility into the performance of various distribution channels for mobile apps, making it difficult to optimize marketing spend and user acquisition strategies.
